data.name: MAD MACHINES
data.detailed_description:
Mad Machines is a team-based ball game, inspired by the most fun and innovative parts of every sport. Step into the arena with one of three different classes of Machines and use their unique combat abilities to hit ball and foe alike - this robotic sport is a brawl where nothing is off the table! Swing at your enemies to take their armour for yourself, and collect their head for a burst of energy that can be the difference between a win and a loss.

Precision is key in the arena. This ballgame was lovingly crafted by a sports fanatic, and with a design rooted in tennis, hockey, and other sports you’ll need to practice, practice, and practice in order to hit that heavy metal ball perfectly. Use your magnet to carry the ball and open up more options in your play - discover your own way to win.

Competitive sport, with intense brawling and precise controls. This is Mad Machines.



Dedicated Servers & Built for Multiplayer
All’s fair in love and brawls.

We are backing the competitive structure of Mad Machines by providing full dedicated servers; competitive integrity and even playing fields are of the utmost importance to us and our players.

Currently, Mad Machines has dedicated servers in 6 regions:
- Europe
- US East
- US West
- South America
- Japan
- Singapore

Mad Machines was built from the ground up with multiplayer in mind, so get your grind on in the arena and GET MAD.

Intuitive Movement & Precision
The ball’s trajectory is based on your movement and your swing, to allow for some clean and creative shots. Use Strafe or Free movement types to travel around the arena with your Machine, using dashes for bursts of speed - see which type you prefer!

Machines
3 classes of Machines are available for your ball-bashing pleasure. Try out the playstyles of the Assassin-class, Support-class, and Heavy-class Machines and see which one is right for you.



Customization
Take your visual specifications to the next level in the Locker Room. Customise your Machine’s colors, weapons, parts, and patterns - everyone knows fashion is vital in the arena! Save presets to easily switch between your favourite Machine masterpieces!

The Arena
The sky’s the limit - literally. Play ball in an open-topped arena with goal tunnels carved out for each team!

The Spikeball
A big metal ball wasn’t quite dangerous enough, so we packed it with gunpowder and spikes. Hit it hard enough and the spikes will come out, causing a lot of damage to an unprepared Machine!



Magnet
Keep your enemies close, but keep the Spikeball closer by using your Machine’s magnet to carry it. Dribble, jump, pass, shoot - there are a ton of options at your disposal!

Stamina
Use all the features of your Machine. Your Stamina gauge recharges over time, and is used for many different aspects of play.



Community Driven & Constantly Upgrading
Mad Machines is an evolving sport, spurred onward by the feedback we receive directly from our community.

Here’s a little taste of what’s to come throughout our Early Access development in 2019…

February 28th
- Steam Launch!
- Ranked Matchmaking & Leaderboards
- Machine Customisation
- Limited Edition Founder’s Pack
- First (limited to preseason/season ZERO) Grease Pack
- Season ZERO PRE PURCHASE AVAILABLE

Prior to Season 0’s start, we wish to give our players a taste of the content they can expect with our upcoming Season passes. Unlock new Machine textures, weapon textures and a multitude of customisation options just by playing, for FREE! The early bird gets the worm, and the early Machine gets the METAL - there’s no excuse to not dive in right now and get a feel for how this aspect of Season 0 will feel when it releases April 18th.


March 14th
- Advanced Machine Customisation & Level Rewards
- Advanced Training Options

April 18th
- Season ZERO Starts
- Purchase period ends for Limited Edition Founder’s Pack
- Additional Machine & Weapon Skins
- Rewards & In-Game Standings for Community Tournaments
- Goal Replays
- Initial Minigame System (shootout)

June 20th
- End of Season ZERO
- New Limited Grease Pack (Season 1)
- Season ZERO Ranked Rewards
- End of Ranked Season ZERO Rewards
- Season 1 Pass Available

If you would like to shape the future of Mad Machines, join our Discord server and talk with us!

The balls are in your court now.

data.short_description: A realistic physics-based bat hitting ball game, based on baseball, tennis, hockey and lacrosse added some real-time destructive combo combat. Batmen playing Batball. Win by points. Everything counts. Goals and kills.1v1 to 3v3 online multiplayer sci-fi arena sport.
data.reviews:
“Combining hockey and combat, Mad Machines provides a new way to play that is better than Lucioball and Rocket League combined”
Coin-Drop

“Mad Machines is the heavy metal Rocket League”
PCGamesN

““My favorite aspects include the destructive melee combat and goalie system. Each goal is shielded by a layer of glass that requires you to launch the ball through it in order to score.”
COG Connected

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3GHz or AMD FX 8300 @3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY
